title: Feeder,scripters,Hackers,toxicplayers
body:
hello riot,
why do you match me up with toxic,feeding,noobie,stupid,unreliable,boosting and scripting persons?.I report them and the next day i still get match up with or against them in matches.If i report and lawful punishment was not given why should i even play this game the worst thing about this is that hackers and disconnecting me from the match and your system is giving me leaver busters.You may think this is funny but this is inflicting serious mental damage.You need to find away to fix this problem.
